DOC.brief_summary: Prospective cohort , monocentric non-randomized interventional clinical study ICU assess evolution body composition use bioelectrical impedance analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Nutritional Status ICU : Interest Measurement Body Composition Body Bioelectrical Impedance Comparison With Several Methods
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , monocentric non-randomized interventional clinical study ICU assess evolution body composition use bioelectrical impedance analysis ( phase angle , fat mass , muscle mass , fat-free mass , body water ) ; comparison four method assess nutritional status . ; compare length mechanical ventilation , length ICU energy expenditure rest malnourish non-malnourished patient .
